item.description:
This is the 3rd GLBT Tea Dance sponsored by Karen, one of the owners of the Harvest Cafe. I've been to the 1st 2 events and had a lot of fun dancing and socializing at an event in Metrowest....Oh my!

 

DJ Dawn will spin tunes from yesterday to today for dancing. The kitchen will be open with a Special Tea Dance menu. Harvest's full bar provides alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages. 21+ with valid ID. Cover $7 at the door.

Karen's comments: This is our Third Tea Dance. Attendance continues to grow in diversity and numbers. Last time, the dance floor was occupied for the entire event. DJ Dawn really accommodated everyone's music requests.

 

Enter from the back parking lot entrance.

I'll arrive by 5 pm to snag the tall table by the window facing Route 85/Washington St.  You'll find me hanging out there or out on the dance floor, once the music gets cranking.

Come on out and play in Metrowest at the Harvest Cafe - "where community happens". www.harvestcafeonline.com http://www.facebook.c... share the Facebook event link with friends.....

group.name: WEST OF BOSTON OVER 40 GAY WOMENS MEET-UP

item.name: Valentine's Tea Dance
